caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 6 .
Drymeia
spp., male terminalia . A–C.
Drymeia fasciculata .
D–F.
Drymeia firthiana .
G–I.
Drymeia gymnophthalma .
A, D, G. Lateral view. B, E, H. Postero-lateral view. C, F, I. Posterior view.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks . A full description of both sexes is given by
Huckett ( 1965 a: 300 )
. Adults of this species are found on flowering plants.
Distribution . Previously known only from the type-series from the Yukon Territory ( Canada ).
